properties.areaDesc: Pryor/Northern Bighorn Mountains; Northeast Bighorn Mountains
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 11 at 2:45AM MST until February 12 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Billings MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10
inches, greatest on north facing slopes.

* WHERE...In Wyoming, Northeast Bighorn Mountains. In Montana,
Pryor/Northern Bighorn Mountains.

* WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 PM MST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel on Highway 14 through Burgess Junction, and
roads in the Story area, will be impacted by snow and poor
visibility. Localized blowing and drifting snow is also
expected.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at
http://www.weather.gov/billings

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM MST WEDNESDAY
